objects.name: TrickBot Yara Rule
objects.description: This is an IoC for TrickBot
objects.pattern: [ yara-rule:value = 'rule MALW_systeminfo_trickbot_module : Trojan { meta: author = "Marc Salinas @Bondey_m" description = "Detects systeminfo module from Trickbot Trojan" strings: $str_systeminf_01 = "" $str_systeminf_02 = "" $str_systeminf_03 = "" $str_systeminf_04 = "GetSystemInfo.pdb" $str_systeminf_05 = "" $str_systeminf_06 = "" condition: all of ($str_ systeminf_*) }' ]
